name: Space Crashers (Fael)
description:
SPACE CRASHERS

Space Crashers is a short space shooter where you have to destroy everything in front of you.

DESTROY ALL YOUR ENEMIES AND GET STRONGER !!!

For now the game has three different enemies and one boss.

I made this game for me to pratice everyfhing I'm learning in game development.

pleas if you can consider rating the game =D

Thanks =D
